Articles.Content: Hey guys, I installed KOS and wanted to know how to make KOS land the first stage of my rocket for me, I've done it many times manually but I just want to see what KOS does just by itself. Any codes that I can just copy and paste would be great, thanks.

I have no experience in that, but you could check the kOS documentarion http://ksp-kos.github.io/KOS_DOC/index.html

They have some community examples in the webpage also.
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.
Thanks for the information guys, sorry I put it in the wrong category Vanamonde.
